PURPOSEltstronggtltpgtltpgtEfficiently retrieves internal and external data and ensures that source data is accurate meaningful and valid for use in analytics and reporting This level combines 23 sources of structured data with a consistent identifier Identifies ways to develop sustainable data provisioning solutions Addresses quality issues for data sets by identifying the root cause and potential solutions Updates or develops dashboards Supports efforts to close data quality gaps by meeting data training needs within the business Works under some supervisionltpgtltpgtltstronggtMAJOR DUTIESltstronggtltpgtltpgtDescription of the major duties performed in this jobltpgtltulgtltligtLocates and acquires data from existing data locations external sources and new data sources as needed to support analytics and reportingltligtltligtOrganizes and cleans the data to remove quality issues combines data sources and provides relevant information which may include developing samples used to create analytics models or reportsltligtltligtCreates ad hoc reports and visualizations that support datadriven decisionsltligtltligtWorks on new data provisioning solutions explores new ways of organizing data and focuses on developing sustainable data usage for designated stakeholders including access costs and organization processesltligtltligtParticipates in creating analytics models by applying data knowledge throughout the modeling process to ensure the data is valid accurate and applicable for the intended usageltligtltligtSupports data governance activities by acting as a data steward or custodian of certain data elementsltligtltulgtltpgtltstronggtQUALIFICATIONSltstronggtltpgtltpgtCompetencies technical skills formal education and relevant work experience critical for
